蜜豆: (みつまめ) - mixture of boiled beans, agar cubes, fruit pieces and syrup
蜥蜴目: (とかげもく) - Squamata (order of scaled reptiles, sometimes esp. the Sauria or Lacertilia)
蜩: (ちょう) - Clear-toned Cicada , evening cicada (Tanna japonesa)
蜷局を巻く: (とぐろをまく) - to coil itself (e.g. a snake); to loaf around
蜷局を解く: (とぐろをほどく) - to uncoil itself
蜻蜒: (ヤンマ) - darner (any dragonfly of family Aeshnidae)/devil's darning needle; dragonfly (esp. a large one)
蜻蜓: (ヤンマ) - darner (any dragonfly of family Aeshnidae)/devil's darning needle; dragonfly (esp. a large one)
蜾蠃: (スガル) - red-banded sand wasp (Ammophila sabulosa); deer
蜿々長蛇: (えんえんちょうだ) - (yoji) (a line, queue) being long and serpentine
蜿蜿長蛇: (えんえんちょうだ) - (yoji) (a line, queue) being long and serpentine
蝉: (せん) - Cigarra, cigarra, gafanhoto; polia de pequeno porte
蝉の羽月: (せみのはづき) - sixth lunar month
蝉時雨: (せみしぐれ) - outburst of cicadas singing
蝉海老: (セミエビ) - blunt slipper lobster (species of shovel-nosed lobster, Scyllarides squammosus)
蝉魴鮄: (セミホウボウ) - Oriental flying gurnard (Dactyloptena orientalis)
蝋人形: (ろうにんぎょう) - waxwork; wax model
蝋梅: (ロウバイ) - wintersweet (Chimonanthus praecox); Japanese allspice
蝋燭の芯: (ろうそくのしん) - wick of a candle
蝋義歯: (ろうぎし) - trial denture; wax denture
蝋膜: (ろうまく) - cere; skin at the base of a bird's beak
蝕む: (むしばむ) - to be worm-eaten/to be eaten by worms; to affect adversely/to spoil/to ruin/to undermine/to gnaw at (one's heart, body, etc.)/to eat into/to destroy
蝕分: (しょくぶん) - phase of an eclipse
蝕害: (しょくがい) - damage to crops by vermin (esp. insects); pest damage
蝕甚: (しょくじん) - maximum eclipse; maximum obscuration
蝗虫: (こうちゅう) - rice grasshopper (of genus Oxya)
蝙蝠: (コウモリ) - bat (Chiroptera spp.); umbrella; opportunist/turncoat
蝙蝠も鳥のうち: (こうもりもとりのうち) - (proverb) capable or not, we are all in the same boat; bats are also birds
蝙蝠も鳥の内: (こうもりもとりのうち) - (proverb) capable or not, we are all in the same boat; bats are also birds
蝙蝠蛾: (コウモリガ) - swift moth (Hepialidae spp., esp. Endoclita excrescens)
蝟集: (いしゅう) - swarm; throng; flock together
蝦夷: (えみし) - historical term for non-Yamato peoples in northern Japan; (えぞ only)  Yezo (northern part of Meiji-era Japan, esp. Hokkaido, but also Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands)
蝦夷上溝桜: (エゾノウワミズザクラ) - bird cherry (Prunus padus)
蝦夷地: (えぞち) - Yezo (northern part of Meiji-era Japan, esp. Hokkaido, but also Sakhalin and the Kuril Islands); Edo-period realm of the Ainu (as opposed to the Japanese) comprising most of Hokkaido
蝦夷山桜: (エゾヤマザクラ) - sargent cherry (Prunus sargentii)
蝦夷松: (エゾマツ) - Yezo spruce (Picea jezoensis); Jezo spruce
蝦夷栗鼠: (エゾリス) - Hokkaido squirrel (subspecies of red squirrel, Sciurus vulgaris orientis)
蝦夷法螺: (エゾボラ) - Ezo neptune (species of whelk, Neptunea polycostata)
蝦夷狼: (えゾオオカミ) - Hokkaido wolf (Canis lupus hattai, extinct)
蝦夷白蝶: (エゾシロチョウ) - black-veined white (species of butterfly, Aporia crataegi)
蝦夷禅庭花: (エゾゼンテイカ) - day lily (Hemerocallis dumortieri); orange-yellow day lily; Nikko day lily
蝦夷縞栗鼠: (えぞしまりす) - Tamias sibiricus lineatus (subspecies of Siberian chipmunk native to Hokkaido)
蝦夷羆: (エゾヒグマ) - Hokkaido brown bear (Ursus arctos yesoensis)
蝦夷菊: (エゾギク) - China aster (Callistephus chinensis); Chinese aster; annual aster
蝦夷葱: (エゾネギ) - chives (Allium schoenoprasum var. schoenoprasum)
蝦夷蔓金梅: (エゾツルキンバイ) - Pacific silverweed (Potentilla egedii var. grandis); Eged's silverweed
蝦夷透百合: (エゾスカシユリ) - Siberian lily (Lilium pensylvanicum)
蝦夷雷鳥: (エゾライチョウ) - hazel grouse (Bonasa bonasia)
蝦夷鳴兎: (えぞナキウサギ) - Ochotona hyperborea yesoensis (subspecies of northern pika)
蝦夷鹿: (エゾシカ) - Hokkaido sika (deer) (Cervus nippon yesoensis); Yezo sika
蝦夷黄菅: (エゾキスゲ) - lemon day-lily (Hemerocallis lilioasphodelus, formerly Hemerocallis flava); lemon lily; yellow day-lily
蝦夷黒貂: (エゾクロテン) - Japanese sable (subspecies of sable native to Hokkaido, Martes zibellina brachyura)
蝦夷鼯鼠: (エゾモモンガ) - Pteromys volans orii (subspecies of the Siberian flying squirrel, endemic to Hokkaido)
蝦尾: (えびお) - (えびお only) goldfish with a shrimp-like tail; head of a shamisen or lute (bent back like a shrimp's tail)
蝦腰: (えびごし) - being bent (with age); being stooped over
蝦蔓: (エビヅル) - Vitis ficifolia (species of grapevine)
蝦蔓虫: (エビヅルムシ) - clearwing moth larva
蝦蛄: (シャコ) - mantis shrimp (any marine crustacean of order Stomatopoda, esp. the species Oratosquilla oratoria)
蝦蛄葉サボテン: (しゃこばサボテン) - Christmas cactus; crab cactus
蝦蟆: (ガマガエル) - toad (esp. the Japanese toad, Bufo japonicus)
蝦蟇: (ガマガエル) - toad (esp. the Japanese toad, Bufo japonicus)
蝦蟇口: (がまぐち) - (etym: toad's mouth)  purse with a metal clasp; handbag (with clasp); pouch (with clasp); coin purse (with clasp)
蝦蟇鮟鱇: (ガマアンコウ) - toadfish (any fish of family Batrachoididae, esp. the Pacuma toadfish, Batrachoides surinamensis)
蝦蟹: (エビガニ) - crayfish (esp. red swamp crayfish, Procambarus clarkii)
蝦責め: (えびぜめ) - Japanese bondage torture (bound victim sits cross-legged with their arms tied behind them, and the rope is tightened until their ankles touch their neck)
